about_the_game:
Story


In the manor where they lived when they were little, they go and meet upon an invitation that came to them.
After a while, they face the manor's curse. They are bound together by a curse, with which they cannot get very far from each other and not very close.
In this manor, they will encounter extraordinary events and try to solve a mystery from their past.

Gameplay

They will be faced with puzzles of varying difficulty in this place. Puzzles requires communication and cooperation. They have to solve these puzzles they encounter by working with each other.

Features

Two player co-op: Players have to work together to solve puzzles. They both have a role to play on the story to move on. Players must communicate with each other via in-game voice.
Story integrated puzzles: As players solve puzzles they encounter, they will make progress about the story.
Various scare methods: As players progress through the game, they will encounter a variety of planned & random scary events. It will be in various forms via sound, image, ambiance.

Goal

The players aim to find a way to break the curse on them, find out the reason for the invitation made to them and by whom. and get out of this manor where they are closed.
After solving the mystery of the manor, they aim to get out of this manor, where they remain closed.

NOTE: This game is co-op only. It requires both players to have a working PC-compatible microphone and an internet connection. Join our Discord (Bonded Forever) and find your buddy to play with!

name: Bonded Forever

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 or equivalent, integrated graphics not supported
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A working PC-compatible microphone
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Bonded Forever is a co-op game that combines horror and puzzle elements. In this game, you and your friend try to go back to the place where you live in your childhood and solve the mysteries that happened while you were away and try to overcome the problems you will face by working together.
